* Contact: <nowiki>[[Daller]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[Svengiersig]]</nowiki>
* Make : Packard Bell
* Model: EasyNote R1100

=== Current Hardware Issues ===

* boots with: vga=771 acpi=force irqpoll

* cpufreq: "centrino" reported, but does'nt load (speedstep-centrino), so p4-clockmod used

* Atheros Wifi Network Adapter
** the ath0 antenna switch is only accessible by windows-driver... workaround:
** install kernel-headers, 
** download http://rfswitch.sourceforge.net/
** install rfswitch (make install)
** in /etc/network/interfaces: load the rfswitch module "pbe5" and turn on the antenna
** post-up modprobe pbe5
** post-up echo 1 > /proc/pbe5/radio
** post-down echo 0 > /proc/pbe5/radio

* xorg.conf
** Horizsync       31.5-50.0
** Vertrefresh     56.0 - 65.0
** modeline  "1280x800@60" 83.46 1280 1344 1480 1680 800 801 804 828 -hsync +vsync

* 3d acceleration (TBD)
** maybe with xserver-via driver
